title: Pittsburgh Knee Rules
desc: The Pittsburgh Knee Rules define when knee x-rays are unnecessary after minor trauma.

orgreference.text: Seaberg DC and Jackson R. Clinical decision rule for knee radiographs. American Journal of Emergency Medicine. 1994; 12(5): 541-3.

other_refer.text: Simon LV, et al. The Pittsburgh decision rule: triage nurse versus physician utilization in the emergency department. Journal of Emergency Medicine. 2006; 31(3): 247-50.
Cheung TC, et al. Diagnostic accuracy and reproducibility of the Ottawa knee rule vs the Pittsburgh decision rule. 2013; 31: 641-5.
